scenario_text.value:
They were pretty tough, but...it looks like
that’s the last of them, somehow.

Yeah... Still, I’m getting pretty sick of
being attacked over and over.

Couldn’t agree more. At any rate, we should
go find Saki and the others...
Grr... Grraaawl!

No way?! How can he still stand after taking
such a nasty beating?!
Dammit! We didn’t finish him off?!

Over here, guys! Head farther in while you
still can!
GOTTA...GRAB...AT LEAST...ONE...!

Hey!
That bastard’s charging straight at Saki!
Argh... Oh no! Run, Saki!!!
Hm?
GOTCHA...!
Saki!!!
Yeeeeeek!
Saki?! No way! Why did the Kenzoku—?!

Eeek! What the—what is this?!
It’s dragging me...
Shit! I won’t let you get her!
Agumon! Let’s go, too!
Yeah!
Me, too!

(Dammit! How’d it turn out like this?!
Make it... We gotta make it!)
Hey, hold out your hand! Sakiii!!!
Kaito! No! You’re pulling me apart! My hand...!
CAN’T...ESCAPE...!

(The Kenzoku disappeared into the fog!
Saki’s about to follow right after!)

No! You can’t give up! I’ll... I’ll save you
no matter what!
Aoi...

(She...barely made it! Thanks to Aoi, Saki
didn’t get swallowed up!)

Yes! Don’t you let go of Saki’s hand, Aoi!
C’mon, Takuma, we gotta pull!
Yeah!
My arm... I can’t feel it anymore!

Huh?! Why?! Why is Saki getting sucked into
the fog?!
What?! What is this?!
What in the deuce...?!

We’ll explain later! Get over here and help
us pull Saki, already!

(Half of her body’s already in the fog!
We have to hurry, or this won’t end well!)

We’re almost there, Saki! We’ll save you no
matter what, so just hang on!

Shit! My palms are getting all slippery from
the sweat!

That damn Kenzoku! How much strength can one
monster have?!

If this keeps up, everyone will...
I...I’m sorry, guys.
Saki?
I...I’m scared...but...but... *sniff*
(Huh? Saki...let go?)
Aoi... Thank you...

No way... Stop... STOP! NO! NONONONO!
Don’t let go—!
AIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!

Saki, Sakiii! No way...
She...she was pulled into the fog!!!
No... This can’t be happening...
How could this...!

Saki...
Saki...?

Saki! Answer us, Saki!
You’re in there, aren’t you?!

I’m going into the fog!
She must be alive in there!

Don’t be crazy, Aoi! Did you forget what
happens when you go in there?!

The professor’s right! It’s too dangerous, no
matter what the reason!
B-but how else can we save Saki...?
Saki! Sakiiiiiiiii!!!

(No response...
No way, this can’t be happening...)
Aaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrrgh!!!
Floramon...?!

What’s going on?! I’m disappearing?!
I...I...!

What is this?!
Why is Floramon vanishing?!
I don’t know! What the heck’s going on?!
(This is just like the time with Ryo...!)
Hey, does... does that mean...?!

Oh... I get it...
Sorry, everyone, it looks like I’m...

What’re you saying?!
You have to hold out for Saki’s sake—
Saki’s gone... That’s why I’m...
Saki...? No way, it can’t be!

Wait, don’t go! Don’t disappear!
Saki... Oh, Saki...!
Bye bye...

Ah, ahhh...
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
She’s gone...

(Saki was swallowed by the fog, and Floramon
disappeared before our very eyes.)
(That means... That means Saki’s already...!)
Saki is gone, too?
I... No, I... I can’t take this. NOOOOOO!
No! God DAMMIT!!!
Saki... Saki...

T-Takuma! This is bad! The fog’s starting to
spread!
I fear it aims to consume this entire area!

(No time to mourn! We have to get out of here
right now!)
Guys, we...we have to get out of here, now!

Takuma? Do you hear what you’re saying?!
Saki... Saki might still be...

Aoi! You...you get it, don’t you?! If all of
us die here, then...
Then Saki’s sacrifice will be for nothing...
No... I don’t believe it... I can’t!

Don’t say another word, Aoi. I’ll help you
up...so stand!
NO! Let me GO! Saki, I’ve got to—!
I said COME ON already!
Kaito! Take care of Aoi!
I got you. Come on, we gotta split.
NOOOOOO! Saki... SAKIII!

Ah...all right, then! Me and Falcomon’ll take
you to the escape route! C’mon, guys!
Let us make haste!
Run, Miu!
*sniff*... Yeah!
I can do nothing... The only adult...

That’s not true. Your levelheadedness
brings a relief to all of us. So...

My apologies, Takuma... It seems I’ve had to
lean on you for encouragement.

First priority is escaping this place safely.
I shall guide the little creatures.
Okay, thank you!
Takuma! We’d better get out of here, too!
Yeah! Let’s hurry!
Stop dragging your damn feet, Aoi!
No! Stop it! Saki...Saki’s still here!

The fog’s gonna swallow you too if it gets
any closer, you idiot!
Saki! SAKI! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

(Looking back, the fog is hot on our tails.
We’re running as fast as we can.)

(The fog’s falling over the amusement park...
Swallowing it piece by piece.)

(It disappeared...vanishing just like
Saki...)
